channel.title: Online Status
channel.description:
Could someone make me a pretty catch "Online Status". Just a nice background with the word "Online" and another one with "Offline" in it. Don't make it gigantic. Thanks.
Pvpone.com - Not trying to advertise. Our current one isn't the greatest as you can see.
I found something that would be pretty cool for "Online" and "Offline".
[IMG]http://i710.photobucket.com/albums/ww102/rosgreen100/skype.jpg[/img]
If you could get like the little bubble like thing around the letters, and make the "Online" image green instead of blue, and red for the "Offline" image.
If you want to attempt this and don't think you can do it like that, don't worry about it. I still need one so try anything.
I found kind a tutorial on how to make the Skype font in Photoshop, for those of you that know how to use it.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y7Q6GLjkO3s
It's in a different language.
Add my msn if I'm not online here, thanks bunches!
Katie.babyy@live.com

item.title: Online Status
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

-dead link-

Choose the ones you want, they’re vectors so I can resize if you give me dimensions.

That’ll be $9001

Edit: Some of them look like crap when you zoom in, I took like 5 minutes on this, so meh

Read full topic

item.title: Online Status
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:9, topic:357958”]Um, if you register your server at http://advertise.serverstatuspage.com/ then you get an image which shows your servers name, uptime and current status. I’m not sure if that’s what you want though, here’s an example -

And an offline one -
[/quote]

I do like them, but I would prefer to have a custom image for it. Thanks though.

Read full topic

item.title: Online Status
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:4, topic:357958”][quote author=Siccc link=topic=454469.msg3327835#msg3327835 date=1283243991]

No actual place for this, although it fits more into the questions section rather than general. I would do it for ya, but atm im getting the last 800k xp I need for 99 cook -.-

Hmm, yeah I was thinking about that, then noticed I other people had some things about graphics in here. Good luck on your 99 cooking.
[/quote]
Thanks, Hopefully I’ll have it before I need to go to the SOS to get my license changed over -.- If you still haven’t got anybody to do this in 12+ hours, I’ll probably be free about then and be able to help ya out :P[/quote]

Thanks alot.

Read full topic
